decks.notes: The main concept of this Modern Aggro - Cascade Crash deck is to use the cascade mechanic to generate card advantage and overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. The deck focuses on casting spells with cascade like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst to continuously cascade into more powerful cards, such as Crashing Footfalls and Tishana's Tidebinder. It also includes disruption and interaction elements, like Force of Negation and Subtlety, to control the board and protect its own threats. The deck utilizes a combination of lands and spells to provide consistent mana and create explosive turns.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on early disruption and aggressive creature plays to put pressure on the opponent. It utilizes cards like Counterspell and Spell Pierce to control the opponent's spells and protect its own threats. Dragon's Rage Channeler and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provide consistent damage output while also generating value. Murktide Regent serves as a powerful finisher that can quickly take over the game. The deck also includes card draw and selection tools like Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble to maintain consistency. The mana base is built to support the deck's aggressive playstyle with a mix of fetch lands and shock lands.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of creatures and various toolbox elements to create a powerful combo. The deck focuses on using creatures with abilities that synergize with each other, such as Blood Artist and Grist, the Hunger Tide. It also includes cards like Eldritch Evolution and Chord of Calling to search for and fetch specific creatures from the deck. The goal is to create a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful combos and synergistic plays.

This deck revolves around a combo involving Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian, known as the CopyCat combo. The key concept is to create infinite copies of Felidar Guardian by using Saheeli Rai's -2 ability and then blinking Saheeli Rai with Felidar Guardian's enter the battlefield trigger. This combo can be further supported by cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, Leyline Binding, and Omnath, Locus of Creation. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending to interact with the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to execute the combo and control the game until it can achieve victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm opponents. The key concept is to utilize powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dauthi Voidwalker to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's hand with Thoughtseize and Grief. It also makes use of removal spells like Fatal Push, Terminate, and Lightning Bolt to maintain control of the board. The deck contains some graveyard recursion with Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Undying Evil, while also incorporating a land destruction element with Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Mount Doom. The deck aims to quickly deal damage and secure victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The key concept of this deck is to aggressively apply pressure on the opponent by utilizing a combination of efficient creatures, disruption spells, and direct damage. The deck focuses on playing early threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Orcish Bowmasters to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. It also includes cards like Thoughtseize and Grief to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt provide the ability to remove threatening creatures. Overall, the deck aims to win the game through its aggressive playstyle and efficient card choices.

This deck focuses on using creatures and chord of calling to assemble a specific combination of cards and achieve a powerful effect. It utilizes creatures like Orcish Bowmasters, Wall of Roots, and Grist, the Hunger Tide as a toolbox to adapt to different situations. It also includes cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Zulaport Cutthroat to take advantage of sacrificing creatures. The deck has a strong emphasis on mana acceleration and mana fixing with cards like Blooming Marsh and Verdant Catacombs. Overall, the deck aims to use its creatures and spells in a synergistic way to create a game-winning combo.

This deck focuses on controlling the game and slowing down the opponent's strategy. It utilizes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Leyline Binding to disrupt the opponent's card advantage and deck manipulation. The key card, The One Ring, allows the player to draw extra cards and gain additional resources. The deck also includes counterspells, removal spells, and board wipes like Supreme Verdict to maintain control of the board. Additionally, it has a small creature package with Kaheera, the Orphanguard to provide some protection and added value. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and outlast the opponent.
